Articles.Content:
Yes, you read the title right!

I AM MAKING A VIDEO GAME!

Unity3D.

Me and 5 other people are making a game.

So if you are interested,

Send us an e-mail at [email protected]

and also

Our website is http://madkidgamestudio.weebly.com

A demo is in there.
Both this post and your entire website have absolutely no information about the actual game. C'mon tell us what it actually is. It could be a virus for all we know.

Didn't look at the demo, but the website looks great

And yeah, some information on the game would be nice, is it a sandbox? physics? puzzle? shoot-em' up?

...or has it not gotten that far yet? EDIT: Played the game, because i'm not suspicious of 6th graders who made a website having a virus and the readme looked OK.

For anyone wondering it's basically "WASD to move, space to jump" and a lit grey room. Bare essentials, but you gotta start somewhere, I suppose.

Edited January 27, 2015 by Norpo

Nice, you gotta start somewhere when learning to make a game. I'd recommend taking your phone number off the site though.

Also, you need a general development goal and a description for your game. What do you envision it to be?

Nice, you gotta start somewhere when learning to make a game. I'd recommend taking your phone number off the site though.

Also, you need a general development goal and a description for your game. What do you envision it to be?

I know him a bit. Yeah, take that phone number off ASAP unless you want tons of calls and stuff. Also, emails... dont mods usually removes emails? Well, it isn't a personal one...

So

To answer many understandable concerns/questions-

Game purpose- Horror

Why is it so small right now?- I made this in 3 hours, I'm starting small, proving essentials.

Phone number- It's a google voice. I don't care about calls in the night.

Video of gameplay: I'll whip up a quick one. After mobile port is confirmed to work.

(this may sound sketchy but) E-mail me if you want demo 2.0.

Edited January 28, 2015 by kenbobo

Now hear this-

I am looking for someone with a mac to download xcode and help me compile an iOS app.

Volunteer work.

Thank you!

Ken

congrats, 6th grade in unity for me, I couldn't do any scripting or really anything for that matter.

Keep on going (and don't give up when you encounter that horror bug like I'm having right now in my own project)

GJ
